name: Zelda 2.5d Tech Demo
description:
This is a simple Tech Demo of the first dungeon in the Legend of Zelda. Runs on modern desktop browsers.

I wanted to try and re-create as much as I could using JavaScript and the ImpactJS Game Engine.

To start the demo, click on the game  with your mouse. To get the mouse back, hit ESC on your keyboard.

Movement:

AWSD to move left, up, down and right.

Mouse to look left and right.

ESC will release the mouse!

Enjoy!
